title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.ISetSetbackVertexDistance
description: Sets the setback distance for the specified vertex and its edges on this variable fillet feature.
signature:
System.Boolean ISetSetbackVertexDistance( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   Vertex
Vtx
,
   ref Edge
EdgeArr
,
   ref System.Double
DistArr
)

parameters.name: Vtx
parameters.description: Vertex for which to set the setback distance

parameters.name: EdgeArr
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of edges at the specified vertex (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: DistArr
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of setback distances at the specified VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

returns: TRUE if setback distance is set, FALSE if not
remarks:
There is a one-to-one correspondence between the edge array and the distance array.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
